dct_description_sm: "Cum privilegio Sacrae Caesare Majestatis & ordinum Belgicae Foederatae".
Bar scales given in "milliaria Iaponica" and "milliaria Germanica".
Appeared in various eds. of Martino Martini's Novus atlas Sinensis (published by Blaeu).
